name: Sandy's Dreamland
description:
Once upon a time, there was a little girl who could never have dreams in her sleep. One night, she wishes to the Sandman to bring her dreams. When she goes to sleep, she finds herself in Dreamland and must find a way out in order to wake up. 

Credits:

Programmers: Steven Duran, Ariel Nam, and Biao Chen

Artists: Janet Doan, Lilly Ngov

Team Lead: Janet Doan
